create.title: Create Dataset
create.subtitle: Select the creation method for the dataset and enter the relevant information.
create.createEmptyDesc: Create a new empty dataset directory, you can upload and manage data files later.
create.importHuggingfaceDesc: Import existing datasets from Hugging Face Hub, supporting URL or dataset path.
create.importModelscopeDesc: Import Chinese-optimized datasets from ModelScope community, focusing on Chinese AI application scenarios.
create.urlHint: Support dataset name (e.g. open-r1/Mixture-of-Thoughts) or full URL
create.modelscopeUrlHint: Support path format (e.g. open-r1/Mixture-of-Thoughts) or full URL, the system will automatically obtain dataset information
create.ownerPlaceholder: Enter owner name or organization name...
create.ownerHint: The combination of owner and dataset name must be unique
create.tagsPlaceholder: Separate tags with commas, e.g. nlp, japanese, qa...
create.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe the content, purpose and features of the dataset...
emptyDatasetSteps: • The system will create a new empty dataset directory
• You can upload data files later from the file management interface
• Support multiple formats: JSON, CSV, Parquet, TXT, etc.
huggingfaceSteps: • The system will download the specified dataset from Hugging Face Hub
• The dataset information (name, description, etc.) will be automatically obtained from the source
• The import process may take several minutes depending on the dataset size
modelscopeSteps: • The system will download the specified dataset from ModelScope community
• The dataset information (name, description, etc.) will be automatically obtained from the source
• The import process may take several minutes depending on the dataset size

success.title: Dataset creation successful!
success.importMessage: The dataset is being imported from {{source}}. You can check the progress on the task management page.

tasks.title: Dataset Tasks
tasks.subtitle: Monitor and manage the progress of dataset creation tasks
